Every step of growth and progress is extremely important, even if it may not seem helpful at the time. Looking back in the future, each step leaves behind many colorful sequences.

Eve is an East Asian illustrator/motion designer based in New York. She specializes in visual design and art direction. Her work experiments with visual storytelling through the use of illustration and animation. Her interest lies between design and pop culture, and she is exploring ways to combine both to make her work even more emotionally appealing.
